CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 21, 1971, pg. 34 reads: "Dedication Banquet - The beautiful new Fellowship Hall at Christian Tabernacle Church, Center Ave. at Watt St., was the scene of a brilliant Dedication banquet, recently, which was an occasion of celebration and thanksgiving to God for the success of the building program.  Dr. Howard O. Jones, standing left, a preacher of world reknown, was principal speaker for the occasion.  The Rev. Ellsworth Holmes, pastor of the church, stands right.  Mrs. Thelma Holmes, wife of the pastor, and James Lockhart, member of the sponsoring team. are seated right.  William Harris, a faithful member of the congregation, is seen in left foreground, and the Rev. William Horner, pastor of Warren United Methodist Church, one of the special guests, front center.  The fellowship hall is also the meeting place for Harty Bible School. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Eight women and two men posed behind banquet table on elevated stage in the Fellowship Hall at Christian Tabernacle Church for dedication banquet
